translation.en: ♪ Jingle bell Jingle bell, jingle bell rock ♪
translation.ja: ケータリング･クリスマス

translation.en: ♪ Snowin' and blowin' up Bushels of fun ♪
translation.ja: “モリーのメニュー･マジック”

translation.en: ♪ Now, the jingle hop… ♪
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: Mr. Braymore.
translation.ja: ブレイモアさん

translation.en: -Oh. Hi, Molly. -How are you?

translation.en: Good. Did you decide on catering for the city hall weekly dinners?

translation.en: We did, and we're going with the Bradford Bros.

translation.en: They offered us a discount on a surf-and-turf we just couldn't pass up.
translation.ja: 割引すると言われて断れなかったんだ

translation.en: I understand.
translation.ja: 分かりました

translation.en: If you need anything, you know where to find me.
translation.ja: またの機会にはぜひ

translation.en: Molly's Menu Magic: you name it, we cater it.
translation.ja: モリーのメニュー･マジックに

translation.en: -[chuckles] Bye. -Bye, Molly.
translation.ja: では またね

translation.en: ♪ That's the jingle bell rock ♪
translation.ja: 〝ブラッドフォード･ブラザーズ〞

translation.en: "Committed to food excellence."
translation.ja: 〝極上の料理をお約束〞

translation.en: -How'd it go? -Good.
translation.ja: どうだった？ 商工会の人たちには大好評だった

translation.en: Chamber of Commerce loved the sandwiches and cookies.

translation.en: They placed a standing lunch order for their monthly meeting.
translation.ja: 月例会のランチはうちに頼むって

translation.en: That's great.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: But we lost city hall weekly dinners to the Bradford Bros.

translation.en: What? No!
translation.ja: ウソ？　そんな

translation.en: Adding insult to injury, those were all over town. That was actually on the front door.
translation.ja: 街中にばらまかれてるそれはうちのドアに

translation.en: They would love getting every catering job, even if it meant putting us out of business.
translation.ja: 仕事を独占して私たちの会社を潰す気ね

translation.en: Well, good thing we put out the magnets before the holiday season.

translation.en: Those were a brilliant idea because no one throws magnets away, unlike…

translation.en: -Any new calls? -No.
translation.ja: 新規の依頼は？ ない

translation.en: I should probably get in line to see Santa with all the other kids in town.

translation.en: If you think that'll work, I'll come with you.
translation.ja: 効果があるなら一緒に行く

translation.en: Okay, there. What do you think?
translation.ja: できた　どう？

translation.en: You are amazing.
translation.ja: あなたって天才

translation.en: You know, it's just missing one thing.
translation.ja: でも一つ足りない

translation.en: -[Molly] There. -You are amazing.
translation.ja: いいわ あなたって天才

translation.en: I love it. I'm gonna go drop it off.
translation.ja: ステキ　届けてくる

translation.en: Great. I'll start on the quiches. Oh, I am meeting my brother for dinner.

translation.en: -Do you mind locking up after? -Oh, yeah. No problem.

translation.en: -Tell Kyle I say hi. -I will.
translation.ja: 分かった　カイルによろしく 伝える

translation.en: Are you sure you can't join us for Christmas in the Keys?

translation.en: The beach house has more than enough room.
translation.ja: 別荘の部屋は十分にある

translation.en: I wish I could. I have a couple holiday orders.

translation.en: I can't afford to cancel them.
translation.ja: 休暇中に依頼が入ってて断る余裕がないの

translation.en: We're proud of you, baby sis. You're really making a go of your catering company.
translation.ja: お前を尊敬してるよケータリングで成功してる

translation.en: Well, I've sunk every penny I have into it.
translation.ja: 全財産をつぎ込んだし

translation.en: It's my lifelong dream. I… I can't afford to fail.

translation.en: It hasn't even been a year and you're already too busy for the annual Frost family Christmas vacation.

translation.en: We'll celebrate Christmas when I'm back.
translation.ja: 帰ってきたらお祝いを

translation.en: [Kyle] Is that…
translation.ja: あれって…

translation.en: That's my ex and his new girlfriend.
translation.ja: 私の元カレと新しい彼女

translation.en: I thought he was a decent guy. What happened?
translation.ja: いいヤツだと思ったのに

translation.en: We weren't on the same page and it took me much longer than it should have
translation.ja: 気が合わなかった 気づくのに随分と時間がかかったわ

translation.en: to realize that.
translation.ja: 気づくのに随分と時間がかかったわ

translation.en: And he refused to try new food.
translation.ja: 新しい食べ物を嫌うの

translation.en: In my experience, the three Cs of a healthy relationship
translation.ja: 健全な関係を築くために大事なのは

translation.en: are communication, commitment, and compromise.
translation.ja: 対話と献身と妥協だ

translation.en: Okay. Well, I will remember that when I decide to dive back into the dating pool.
translation.ja: 恋愛市場に復帰する時はそれを思い出す

translation.en: I just want you to be happy.
translation.ja: 幸せになってほしい

translation.en: If I can make Molly's Menu Magic a success,
translation.ja: 会社が成功したら幸せよ

translation.en: I will be as happy as a kid on Christmas morning.

translation.en: [British accent] Welcome home, Mr. Harrison.
translation.ja: おかえりなさいませハリソン様

translation.en: [laughing, American accent] Oh, Cars, it's good to see you.

translation.en: -It is good to see you too. -Once a year doesn't seem enough.

translation.en: Not much use for event photographers around here.

translation.en: -Do you have any luggage? -No. I'll get it later.

translation.en: Where is she?

translation.en: She's in the library putting the finishing touches on the Christmas tree.

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna catch up with you later.

translation.en: I wanna surprise her.

translation.en: There.
translation.ja: いいわ

translation.en: Now you look perfect.
translation.ja: これで完璧

translation.en: [gasps] Carson!
translation.ja: カーソン！

translation.en: I'm so glad you're home.
translation.ja: 帰ってきてくれてうれしいわ

translation.en: Oh, I'm so glad to be back.

translation.en: Well, my show in Milan ended early, so…

translation.en: I'm glad, and I expect full photo approval.

translation.en: -Oh, that goes without saying. -[laughs]

translation.en: -Are you hungry? -Uh, no.
translation.ja: おなかは？ すいてないすいたら適当に作る

translation.en: I'll make myself something later if I get hungry.
translation.ja: すいてないすいたら適当に作る

translation.en: Since when do you cook?
translation.ja: いつから料理を？

translation.en: Well, I'm a whiz in the kitchen with anything to do
translation.ja: 得意だよ ミルクか水を入れるだけの料理ならね

translation.en: with mixing milk or water. Just the basic things.
translation.ja: ミルクか水を入れるだけの料理ならね

translation.en: It's pretty much the same every year, isn't it?
translation.ja: 毎年同じだろ？

translation.en: Tell you what, next year when you take over the foundation,
translation.ja: 朗報よ 来年あなたが財団を継いだら

translation.en: you can change things up however you like.
translation.ja: 好きなように変えていいわ

translation.en: I am not taking over the foundation.
translation.ja: 僕は継がない

translation.en: One of the cousins will be much better.
translation.ja: いとこの誰かに譲る

translation.en: The cousins have too many responsibilities as it is and are already stretched too thin.
translation.ja: いとこたちは既に他のことで手一杯よ

translation.en: Tell you what, you're tired. We will discuss this at another time.
translation.ja: 疲れてるだろうからまた改めて話しましょう

translation.en: That sounds good.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Carson, I'm glad you're home.
translation.ja: カーソン　おかえりなさい

translation.en: So am I.
translation.ja: ただいま

translation.en: Tell me about Milan.
translation.ja: ミラノの話を

translation.en: -Morning. -Good morning.
translation.ja: やあ おはようございます

translation.en: Would you like some juice or a Danish?

translation.en: Uh, no. Just some tea.
translation.ja: 紅茶だけ

translation.en: Ah, I got it. You don't have to take care of me.

translation.en: It's my job to take care of you.
translation.ja: 私の仕事ですから

translation.en: Maybe it's time to settle down in one place?

translation.en: Wow. That was an amazing impression of Aunt Jean.

translation.en: I may be parroting her concerns, but I think of you like my own nephew.

translation.en: I know, but I enjoy not having my future mapped out for me.

translation.en: No obligations, no one knows I'm part of the Harrison dynasty.

translation.en: Your aunt worries about you. I know she's looking forward to--

translation.en: The Gala is a thank-you to our board and benefactors,

translation.en: and I will not serve them an over-salted entrée

translation.en: and dessert bars that taste as if they came
translation.ja: スーパーのお惣菜コーナーで売られてるような 塩分過多の食べ物を出すつもりはないわ

translation.en: from the day-old section of the supermarket.
translation.ja: 塩分過多の食べ物を出すつもりはないわ

translation.en: You quit? Fine.

translation.en: And meanwhile, I will look for a caterer who understands the meaning of high-quality cuisine.
translation.ja: 質の高い料理を提供する業者に依頼するわ

translation.en: Thank you. Goodbye.
translation.ja: お世話さま　さようなら

translation.en: We need a new caterer.

translation.en: -Christmas Gala's in eight days, right? -I am well aware of that.
translation.ja: ガラは８日後だろ？ それは分かってる

translation.en: Robert, who else do we have in the file?

translation.en: Oh, my. I appreciate your organizational abilities.
translation.ja: あなたは本当に整理整頓が上手ね

translation.en: So…
translation.ja: それじゃ

translation.en: which shall we choose?

translation.en: Hello?
translation.ja: こんにちは

translation.en: Happy holidays. How can I help you?

translation.en: Uh… I'm looking for Molly Frost.

translation.en: I'm Molly.
translation.ja: 私です

translation.en: I'm Jean Harrison of the Harrison Foundation.

translation.en: Yes, of course. Your family's done incredible things for the community.

translation.en: Your grant to the local school saved the arts program. All of the programs, really. It's incredible.

translation.en: What can I do for you, Mrs. Harrison?

translation.en: Understood. We have all our licenses and certifications.
translation.ja: 免許と資格は掲示しています

translation.en: Yes, I see that.
translation.ja: ええ 見たわ

translation.en: Every year we have a Christmas Gala with a dinner on December 23rd.

translation.en: -I know it's short notice. -I would love to.
translation.ja: 急だけど… お受けします

translation.en: Excellent.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: Are you available to come for an interview this afternoon at three o'clock?
translation.ja: 今日の午後３時に面接に来てもらえる？

translation.en: Oh, an interview?
translation.ja: 面接？

translation.en: I need to be assured that you can indeed create magical cuisine.
translation.ja: 魔法のような料理を作れるか確かめないと

translation.en: Of course. I will be there.
translation.ja: 分かりました　伺います

translation.en: Thank you for the opportunity.
translation.ja: 機会に感謝します

translation.en: No, thank you.
translation.ja: こちらこそありがとう

translation.en: Hey.
translation.ja: モリー

translation.en: Hi.
translation.ja: クリスティーナ

translation.en: Jean Harrison might want us to cater the Harrison Foundation Christmas Gala.
translation.ja: ハリソン財団のガラの仕事が決まるかも 街で最大のイベントよ

translation.en: -That's the biggest event of the year. -I know.
translation.ja: 街で最大のイベントよ 知ってる

translation.en: We have to be there at 3:00. I think she might want us to make her a meal.
translation.ja: ３時に面接があるわ何か作ることになるはず

translation.en: But what about the Christmas dessert
translation.ja: 今日の午後はお年寄りの集会に

translation.en: that we're catering for the senior citizen event this afternoon?

translation.en: Right. That's today.

translation.en: Okay. If you can do that on your own, maybe Cindy can help me.

translation.en: -Uh… -Oh, no. She's out of town.

translation.en: You don't know him, but my friend Taylor is a fantastic sous chef
translation.ja: 友達のテイラーがスーシェフなの

translation.en: and he's in between jobs right now.
translation.ja: 求職中だから連絡してみる

translation.en: -I'll just text him. -Yes, please.

translation.en: He's one town away, so he's not that far.
translation.ja: 隣町に住んでるから遠くない

translation.en: -Great. -[phone chimes] He's free.
translation.ja: 暇だって

translation.en: Wow. Amazing.
translation.ja: よかった　来るよう言って

translation.en: -Okay, tell him to meet me there. -Okay.
translation.ja: よかった　来るよう言って 分かった

translation.en: Now I just have to figure out what to serve.
translation.ja: 何を作るか考えなきゃ

translation.en: Oh, you got this.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ

translation.en: You must be Molly.
translation.ja: モリーさん？

translation.en: Lovely to meet you, Mr. Harrison.
translation.ja: どうも ハリソンさん

translation.en: Mr. Harrison passed many years ago.
translation.ja: 旦那様は他界されました私はロバート

translation.en: I'm Robert, the long-time, but not long-suffering, estate manager.
translation.ja: 旦那様は他界されました私はロバート 長年 屋敷の管理人を務めています

translation.en: -Please come in. -Thank you.
translation.ja: 中へ どうも

translation.en: Wow. It's beautiful.
translation.ja: ステキですね

translation.en: Jean decorated everything herself.
translation.ja: 装飾は全てジーン様が

translation.en: Let me show you the kitchen.
translation.ja: こちらです

translation.en: This is my dream kitchen.
translation.ja: 夢のようなキッチンですね

translation.en: Jean would like you to prepare her a three-course holiday meal.

translation.en: You will, of course, be compensated for your time today.
translation.ja: もちろん報酬はお支払いします

translation.en: Any dietary restrictions?
translation.ja: 食品の制限は？

translation.en: None whatsoever, though she does have a certain fondness for chocolate.
translation.ja: ありません チョコレートがお好きです

translation.en: After my own heart.
translation.ja: 気が合いそう

translation.en: When my sous chef arrives, will you send him in?
translation.ja: スーシェフが来たら案内を

translation.en: Certainly. Good luck.
translation.ja: 承知しました 幸運を祈ります

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: [Molly] There you are. Finally.
translation.ja: やっと来た

translation.en: -Finally? -Are your hands clean?
translation.ja: やっと？ 手はきれい？

translation.en: -Just washed 'em. -Great. You can finish mincing the celery.
translation.ja: 洗った セロリをみじん切りにして

translation.en: Carrots need to be julienned, parsnips need to be peeled and chopped.
translation.ja: ニンジンは千切りパースニップは皮をむいて

translation.en: What are we making?

translation.en: An heirloom tomato salad with lemon-thyme panko-crusted chicken and parsnip purée.
translation.ja: エアルームトマトサラダとレモンタイムのチキンカツ

translation.en: For dessert, a pistachio cranberry fudge brownie.
translation.ja: ピスタチオとクランベリーのブラウニーよ

translation.en: Yum. Hope I get to have some.
translation.ja: うまそう　僕も食べたい

translation.en: Very funny.
translation.ja: 笑える

translation.en: Get to work. We don't have much time.
translation.ja: 始めて　時間がないの

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
translation.ja: はい シェフ

translation.en: The celery needs to be minced.
translation.ja: みじん切りよ

translation.en: Cut into very small pieces?
translation.ja: 細かく切り刻んで

translation.en: [Carson] Is that better?
translation.ja: マシになった？

translation.en: Who taught you how to hold a knife?
translation.ja: 誰に教わったの？

translation.en: You move your hand up like that.
translation.ja: 包丁はこう持つのよ

translation.en: That's better.

translation.en: -This needs to be perfect. -Why's that?

translation.en: Didn't Christina tell you? This is for Jean Harrison.

translation.en: She's fired nearly every catering company she's ever used.
translation.ja: 雇った業者を片っ端からクビにしてる

translation.en: Apparently, she's impossible to please.
translation.ja: 気難しいのよ

translation.en: Is that so?

translation.en: Who else hires a caterer to come to their house and cook as an interview?
translation.ja: 面接をする人なんて他にいないもの

translation.en: Well, I guess you didn't have to come.
translation.ja: 嫌なら断ればいい

translation.en: Are you kidding?
translation.ja: 冗談でしょ？

translation.en: This dinner could make my career. I need this job.
translation.ja: この仕事にキャリアが懸かってるのよ

translation.en: Gotcha.
translation.ja: 了解

translation.en: Your sous chef is here. He's washing his hands.
translation.ja: スーシェフが来られました

translation.en: -Then who…? -Carson, what are you doing down here?
translation.ja: この人は？ カーソン ここで何を？

translation.en: I was just coming in to get a snack, and I was put to work.
translation.ja: 食べ物を取りに来たんだ

translation.en: Your aunt would like to see you.
translation.ja: おばさまの所へ

translation.en: Your aunt? Wh-Who's your aunt? Not…

translation.en: Jean Harrison. Yeah.

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry. I was just…
translation.ja: 本当に申し訳ない

translation.en: Everything looks delicious.
translation.ja: どれもおいしそうだ

translation.en: [Robert] Carson!
translation.ja: カーソン！

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 悪かった

translation.en: And good luck.
translation.ja: 頑張って

translation.en: Is that Champagne vinegar?
translation.ja: シャンパンビネガー？

translation.en: Yes. I found some in the back of the pantry.
translation.ja: パントリーで見つけました

translation.en: You should've used the grainy mustard.
translation.ja: 粒マスタードを使うべきだったわ

translation.en: And I think it needs a touch more garlic to balance out the lemon.
translation.ja: レモンに負けないようニンニクを効かせた方がいい

translation.en: You really know your flavoring agents.
translation.ja: 詳しいんですね

translation.en: I have hosted many, many dinner parties over the years.
translation.ja: 長年に渡って数々の晩餐(ばんさん)会を主催してきたからね

translation.en: Oh, you're done? Would you like the dessert?
translation.ja: お済みですか？デザートは？

translation.en: A brownie?
translation.ja: ブラウニー？

translation.en: Yes. I adapted my grandmother's recipe. She used to make it every December.
translation.ja: 祖母が毎年12月に作ってくれたレシピです

translation.en: This is very good.
translation.ja: すごくおいしいわ

translation.en: Thank you.
